import React ,{useEffect,useContext,useState} from "react"; import Heart from "../../assets/Heart"; import { FirebaseContext } from "../../store/Context"; import "./Post.css"; function Posts() { const {firebase} = useContext(FirebaseContext) const [products,setProducts] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ firebase.firestore().collection('product').get().then((snapshot)=>{ const allPost = snapshot.docs.map((product)=>{ return { ...product.data(), id:product.id, } }) setProducts(allPost) }) },[]) return (
